segment.source: Modify the Port on Which the AGPM Service Listens
segment.target: Modify the Port on Which the AGPM Service Listens

segment.source: Modify the Port on Which the AGPM Service Listens
segment.target: Modify the Port on Which the AGPM Service Listens

segment.source: Modify the Port on Which the AGPM Service Listens
segment.target: Modify the Port on Which the AGPM Service Listens

segment.source: The AGPM Service is a Windows service that acts as a security proxy, managing client access to Group Policy objects (GPOs) in the archive and production environment.
segment.target: The AGPM Service is a Windows service that acts as a security proxy, managing client access to Group Policy objects (GPOs) in the archive and production environment.

segment.source: By default, the AGPM Service listens on port 4600.
segment.target: By default, the AGPM Service listens on port 4600.

segment.source: You can change this port by modifying the Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) archive index file for each archive.
segment.target: You can change this port by modifying the Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) archive index file for each archive.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Before modifying the port on which the AGPM Service listens, it is recommended that you back up the AGPM archive index file (gpostate.xml).
segment.target: Before modifying the port on which the AGPM Service listens, it is recommended that you back up the AGPM archive index file (gpostate.xml).

segment.source: This file is located in the folder entered as the archive path during the installation of Advanced Group Policy Management - Server.
segment.target: This file is located in the folder entered as the archive path during the installation of Advanced Group Policy Management - Server.

segment.source: By default, this location of this file is %CommonAppData%MicrosoftAGPMgpostate.xml on the AGPM Server.
segment.target: By default, this location of this file is %CommonAppData%MicrosoftAGPMgpostate.xml on the AGPM Server.

segment.source: If you do not know which computer hosts the archive, you can follow the procedure for modifying the archive path to display the current archive path.
segment.target: If you do not know which computer hosts the archive, you can follow the procedure for modifying the archive path to display the current archive path.

segment.source: For more information, see Modify the Archive Path.
segment.target: For more information, see Modify the Archive Path.

segment.source: A user account with access to the AGPM Server (the computer on which the AGPM Service is installed) and the archive index file is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account with access to the AGPM Server (the computer on which the AGPM Service is installed) and the archive index file is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: To modify the port on which the AGPM Service listens
segment.target: To modify the port on which the AGPM Service listens

segment.source: On the computer hosting the archive, open the archive index file (gpostate.xml) in a text editor.
segment.target: On the computer hosting the archive, open the archive index file (gpostate.xml) in a text editor.

segment.source: In the file, search for agpm:port="4600".
segment.target: In the file, search for agpm:port="4600".

segment.source: Replace 4600 with the port on which the AGPM Service should listen; then, save and close the file.
segment.target: Replace 4600 with the port on which the AGPM Service should listen; then, save and close the file.

segment.source: On the AGPM Server, restart the AGPM Service.
segment.target: On the AGPM Server, restart the AGPM Service.

segment.source: (For more information, see Start and Stop the AGPM Service.)
segment.target: (For more information, see Start and Stop the AGPM Service.)

segment.source: Modify the port in the AGPM Server connection for each Group Policy administrator.
segment.target: Modify the port in the AGPM Server connection for each Group Policy administrator.

segment.source: (For more information, see Configure the AGPM Server Connection.)
segment.target: (For more information, see Configure the AGPM Server Connection.)

segment.source: Repeat for each archive and AGPM Server.
segment.target: Repeat for each archive and AGPM Server.

segment.source: Additional references
segment.target: Additional references

segment.source: Managing the AGPM Service
segment.target: Managing the AGPM Service
